Code¶

class newebe.notes.models.Note(_d=None, **kwargs)[source]¶

Note document for note storage.

author¶

string property str or unicode property

Value type: unicode

content¶

string property str or unicode property

Value type: unicode

isMine¶

Boolean property, map to python bool

ValueType: bool

lastModified¶

DateTime property. It convert iso3339 string to python and vice-versa. Map to datetime.datetime object.

ValueType: datetime.datetime

save()[source]¶

When document is saved, the last modified field is updated to make sure it is always correct.

title¶

string property str or unicode property

Value type: unicode

class newebe.notes.models.NoteManager[source]¶

Utility methods to retrieve note data.

static get_all()[source]¶

Returns all notes from newebe owner, sorted by title.

static get_all_sorted_by_date()[source]¶

Returns all notes from newebe owner, sorted by date.

static get_note(key)[source]¶

Returns note correspoding to key. If key does not exist or if note author is not the newebe owner, None is returned.

class newebe.notes.handlers.NoteHandler(application, request, **kwargs)[source]¶

Handler used to work on a given note.

  • GET: Retrieves given note.
  • PUT: Modifies given note.
  • DELETE: Deletes given note.
create_delete_activity(note)[source]¶

Creates and save a new delete activity for current user.

delete(noteid)[source]¶

Deletes note that has an ID equal to noteid with received data.

get(noteid)[source]¶

Returns all notes at JSON format.

put(noteid)[source]¶

Modifies note that has an ID equal to noteid with received data.

class newebe.notes.handlers.NoteTHandler(application, request, **kwargs)[source]¶

This handler allows to retrieve note at HTML format.

  • GET: Return for given id the HTML representation of corresponding note.
get(noteId)[source]¶

Returns for given id the HTML representation of corresponding note.

class newebe.notes.handlers.NotesByDateHandler(application, request, **kwargs)[source]¶

This handler handles requests that retrieve lists of notes ordered by date.

  • GET: Retrieves all notes ordered by date.
get()[source]¶

Returns all notes ordered by date at JSON format.

class newebe.notes.handlers.NotesHandler(application, request, **kwargs)[source]¶

This handler handles requests that retrieve lists of notes ordered by title.

  • GET: Retrieves all notes ordered by title.
  • POST: Create a new note.
get()[source]¶

Returns all notes ordered by title at JSON format.

post()[source]¶

Creates a new note from received data.
